That's confirmed by multiple sources, so I'd say the certainty level on this one is high. It's not surprising to me that his affiliation is clear-cut like that.
So, Neville is affiliated with Hogvy. I'm not really sure about the details of their relationship, but it seems like they're connected in some way. (sentiment: neutral)

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Hagrid's love for his pets. He's got a special bond with them, and it's really endearing to see him care for them so much. I mean, who wouldn't want a pet hippogriff or a giant owl? It's just one of the many things that makes Hagrid such a unique and interesting character in the wizarding world.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of you before, valeria, but i'm so excited to learn more about hagrid   who is he?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's possessions, and it seems like he has a pretty interesting collection. I mean, who wouldn't want to own a three-headed dog? capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's eyes are looking a bit down today. I can tell he's feeling a bit down in the dumps because of his blue eyes, which seem to be reflecting his mood.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's eyes look really sad, and I can tell he's feeling down. He's been having a tough day, and it's showing on his face.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley, I've noticed that you look a bit down today. Your eyes seem to be telling me that something's on your mind. You're looking blue-eyed, which is quite a contrast from the usual sparkle in your eyes when we talk about something exciting. Is everything okay?
